--- Nosecone / Pacifix / Crossroads / Afterburner / Scattershot ---

Nosecone transforms, and pushes the debri off of him. The debri 
slides to the ground beside him. "That was unfortunate," he dusts 
himself off, and smiles.

Pacifix nods, and places the disabled bot into Ironhide. "He should 
be out for a while, judging from his wounds." comments Pacifix. 

Crossroads explores the ship.

Afterburner and Scattershot follow Lightspeed and Hoist. They begin 
picking up pieces of the roof and putting them into Hoist's back end.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Hoist transforms. "We go to clear the ruble away from the ship." he 
then
> drives towards it. Lightspeed nods then transforms and follows 
Hoist.
> They arrive and then then the back of Hoist's truck compartmetn 
lowers
> out into a shovel. He back towards a large pile of ruble as it 
loads up
> into his rear. Lighspeed transforms, and begins to lift large 
pieces of
> rock.
> 
> Strafe jumps into the air and transforms, following Scattershot. He 
then
> blasts larger rocks, and as they vaporize he corrects himself in 
the air
> to continue.
> 
> Ironhide nods. "Excellent idea." he transforms, and opens up the 
rear of
> the van.
